name: Merge 9
description:
1. "Merge 9" is a numbers merged puzzle game.
2. Two game modes：Hexagon mode and Square mode.
3. How to play? — To form a higher number by merging three or more pieces of the same number.
4. What is the goal? — Match and merge numbers to get 9, and then reach a high score!
5. Reasonable strategies play a key role, so you may need to take each step seriously.
6. Try it now! Maybe once you start, you cannot stop!

If you have any questions or suggestions, please email us at contact@mudotek.com.
